author: Simon King
description: Chocolate cocktail with extra interest thanks to vanilla and cardamom.
name: Easter cocktail
recipeIngredient: 30 ml White crème de cacao liqueur
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE cardamom pods in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass
